flawed_nl_solution:
Roberto skips 70 times per minute because 4200 / 60 = <<4200/60=70>>70.
Together they skip 150 times a minute.
They will skip 2520 times because 150 x 15 = <<150*15=2520>>2520
#### 2520

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2250, not 2520. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
